summary: 1985  was a common year starting on Tuesday of the Gregorian calendar.
full_text: 1985  was a common year starting on Tuesday  of the Gregorian calendar, the 1985th year of the Common Era  and Anno Domini  designations, the 985th year of the 2nd millennium, the 85th year of the 20th century, and the 6th year of the 1980s decade. The year 1985 was designated as the International Youth Year by the United Nations.
